items.title: 14-year-old busted for reckless motorcycle stunt on viral video
items.summary: NIBONG TEBAL: Police detain a 14-year-old student after a video of him performing dangerous motorcycle stunts on the Sultan Abdul Halim Muadzam Shah Bridge went viral on social media. Read full story

items.title: Review: Ride1Up’s Revv1 DRT e-bike is a rugged off-roader with plenty of suspension and hidden punch
items.summary:
When it comes to e-bikes, most people’s immediate thought is a commuter model designed to get you through streets to your various destinations, but with Ride1Up’s Revv1 DRT e-bike, the fun is extended (and primarily focused) to off-road adventures, and boy, does this baby have some go in it. It’s been over two years since we reviewed the Revv1 FS counterpart, which we came away quite impressed with its SUPER73-like design. Now we’re heading off the beaten path with this newer off-road variant, which boasts improved specs that outshine its predecessors in the series. You can learn more about the Revv1 DRT e-bike’s capabilities and my hands-on impressions below.

more…

items.title: Yakuza 0: Director’s Cut for Nintendo Switch 2 now at $37 Amazon low, Kirby Air Riders, Civ VII, more
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Yakuza 0: Director’s Cut for Nintendo Switch 2 down at a new $37 shipped all-time low. Now also matched over at Walmart, this is 26% off the regular $50 list price and the best we can find. Today’s deal lands at a few bucks under our previous mention to deliver Amazon all-time low pricing. It might be a Game-Key Card in the box, but it is still a solid price and frankly the only way to land a “physical” copy for the shelf in your game room, not to mention it now being at the best price we have tracked.

items.title: Just $15 gets you this wildly thin metal 5K iPhone 17/Air ready MagSafe power bank today
items.summary:
LISEN 0.3-inch ultra-slim 5,000mAh MagSafe power bank

Buy for $15 (Reg. $22)

Enter promo code C8DZQIYV for $7 off.

What we love

The highlight of this power bank is its ultra-thin form factor – it’s just 0.3 inches thick and one of the slimmest power banks available today. It’s MagSafe-compatible, has a sleek “5D curved” design that makes it comfortable to hold, and it packs a 5,000mAh battery to top up your phone when you’re on the move. This unit even ships with a Type-C cable and includes essential safety protections like overcharge prevention.

items.summary:

items.title: LEGO’s massive Star Wars UCS Death Star is officially open for purchase with a GWP set at $1,000
items.summary:
With the clock having officially ticked us over into October, LEGO is releasing its next wave of new building sets, including the much-buzzed-about Star Wars 75419 UCS Death Star set that is definitely taking center stage for folks able to shell out the hefty $999.99 price tag. This new set has been carrying three titles since it was revealed at the top of September: LEGO’s largest build to date, as well as the most expensive build, and the most accompanying minifigure collection. What’s more, picking this set up in the first week of its release will also net you an exclusive GWP (more on that below the fold).

items.summary:
We have secured 9to5 readers an exclusive discount on the Statik State Semi-Solid Power Bank using code 9T0520OFF at checkout. Statik launched its all-new power bank with a semi-solid state design back in August to land alongside a small but growing number of accessory brands starting to trade-out the less reliable and, apparently, less safe traditional lithium-ion batteries for options like this one that “virtually eliminates fire and explosion risks.” And now you can score the best price we have tracked on it.

items.title: Save up to up to 30% on these LEGO sets and score a FREE $20 Amazon credit for fall Prime Day
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering a $20 credit when you spend $100 or more on over 1,000+ items, which includes things like LEGO sets, clothing, games, console controllers, Fitbit trackers, kitchen appliances, and so much more. Among the massive array of eligible items, we’re seeing a large lineup of LEGO building sets, like the Minecraft Woodland Mansion Fighting Ring down at a new $41 low or the popular Technic Planet Earth and Moon in Orbit at $60.99 shipped – and even newer builds like the Disney & Pixar Wall-E & EVE set that aren’t getting discounts but do contribute to you getting free money after the purchase. Head below to check out the full curated lineup of eligible LEGO sets, as well as other items that are included in this early Prime Day promotion. You can also view the entire promotion’s eligible items on the main landing page here.
